languages.text: Многим это стоило жизней, но те, кто преодолел сей кризис, стали закаленными ветеранами и опорой дома. Почти все эти счастливчики были молоды и отважны, и прискорбно мало среди них было умудренных старцев.
Many lost their lives, but those who survived the crisis became hardened veterans and pillars of the House. Most of those fortunate souls were young and brave, too few among them were old and wise.
languages.original_text: Многим это стоило жизней, но те, кто преодолел сей кризис, стали закаленными ветеранами и опорой дома. Почти все эти счастливчики были молоды и отважны, и прискорбно мало среди них было умудренных старцев.

traits.locale_text: Many lost their lives due to this. But those, who overcame this crisis, became hardened veterans and pillars of the House. Most of those fortunate souls were young and brave, too few were wise and old among them.

Many lost their lives, but those who survived the crisis became hardened veterans and pillars of the House. Most of those fortunate souls were young and brave, too few among them were old and wise.

languages.text: 许多人在这场危机中丧生，而幸存下来的人都成为了经验丰富的导航者，成为了家族的顶梁柱。这些幸运的人大多是勇敢的年轻人，只有极少数是富有智慧的老者。
languages.original_text: Many lost their lives, but those who survived the crisis became hardened veterans and pillars of the House. Most of those fortunate souls were young and brave, too few among them were old and wise.

traits.locale_text: 许多人在这场危机中丧生，而幸存下来的人都成为了经验丰富的导航者，成为了家族的顶梁柱。这些幸运的人大多是勇敢的年轻人，只有极少数是富有智慧的老者。

languages.text: Viele ließen ihr Leben, doch wer die Krise überlebte, der wurde zu einem abgehärteten Veteranen und einer Säule des Hauses. Die meisten dieser glücklichen Seelen waren jung und mutig, zu wenige unter ihnen alt und weise.
languages.original_text: Many lost their lives, but those who survived the crisis became hardened veterans and pillars of the House. Most of those fortunate souls were young and brave, too few among them were old and wise.

traits.locale_text: Viele ließen ihr Leben, doch wer die Krise überlebte, der wurde zu einem abgehärteten Veteranen und einer Säule des Hauses. Die meisten dieser glücklichen Seelen waren jung und mutig, zu wenige unter ihnen alt und weise.

languages.text: Cette crise fit de nombreuses victimes, notamment parmi les doyens les plus sages. Les survivants, jeunes et courageux pour la plupart, devinrent des vétérans endurcis et des piliers de la maison.
languages.original_text: Many lost their lives, but those who survived the crisis became hardened veterans and pillars of the House. Most of those fortunate souls were young and brave, too few among them were old and wise.

traits.locale_text: Cette crise fit de nombreuses victimes, notamment parmi les doyens les plus sages. Les survivants, jeunes et courageux pour la plupart, devinrent des vétérans endurcis et des piliers de la maison.

languages.text: Muchos fallecieron durante el proceso, pero los supervivientes de la crisis se convirtieron en veteranos experimentados y pilares de la casa. La mayoría de esos afortunados eran jóvenes y valientes, y muy pocos ancianos y sabios.
languages.original_text: Many lost their lives, but those who survived the crisis became hardened veterans and pillars of the House. Most of those fortunate souls were young and brave, too few among them were old and wise.

traits.locale_text: Muchos fallecieron durante el proceso, pero los supervivientes de la crisis se convirtieron en veteranos experimentados y pilares de la casa. La mayoría de esos afortunados eran jóvenes y valientes, y muy pocos ancianos y sabios.

languages.text: 多くの者が命を落としたが、危機を乗り切った者は鍛えられしベテランとなり、一族の柱となった。その幸運な魂のほとんどは若く勇敢であったが、その中で老齢で賢明な者はあまりにも少なかった。
languages.original_text: Many lost their lives, but those who survived the crisis became hardened veterans and pillars of the House. Most of those fortunate souls were young and brave, too few among them were old and wise.

traits.locale_text: 多くの者が命を落としたが、危機を乗り切った者は鍛えられしベテランとなり、一族の柱となった。その幸運な魂のほとんどは若く勇敢であったが、その中で老齢で賢明な者はあまりにも少なかった。

languages.text: Birçokları yaşamını yitirirken krizden sağ kurtulanlar, deneyimlerinden güç aldı ve Hane'yi ayakta tutan ana direkler oldu. Bu talihlilerin birçoğu genç ve cesur, küçük bir kısmı ise yaşlı ve bilgeydi.
languages.original_text: Many lost their lives, but those who survived the crisis became hardened veterans and pillars of the House. Most of those fortunate souls were young and brave, too few among them were old and wise.

traits.locale_text: Birçokları yaşamını yitirdi ancak krizden sağ kurtulanlar, deneyimlerinden güç aldı ve Hane'nin yapı taşlarından oldu. Bu talihli kişilerin birçoğu genç ve cesur, küçük bir kısmı ise yaşlı ve bilgeydi.
